name: UNITED EARTH COMMAND: SPACE FORCE
description:
United Earth Command: Space Force is a fictional space adventure. Set in humanity's future encounter with alien aggressors from another world, enjoy the fast-paced action combat with sweet Power-Ups to decimate the enemies who don't fire back!

Designed as a Single Player game with horizontal Gameplay, UEC: Space Force is filled with fast-paced space action combat, Power-Ups & visual FX.

Take flight in the first installment of United Earth Command: Space Force.

One small step for United Earth Command!
